Key Match Events: Jordyn Adams hit a walk-off single in the 13th inning to score Eric Wagaman and win 4-3
Post-Match Reflections: Ron Washington stated that the team had opportunities throughout the game but couldn't capitalize, especially in extra innings. However, they kept going and finally caught a break.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox had the bases loaded with two outs in the 13th inning but José Quijada struck out Yoán Moncada to end the frame.
